credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet: 8 1/2 x 5 1/2 in. (21.6 x 14 cm)
Other (envelope): 8.9 x 14 cm (3 1/2 x 5 1/2 in.)
title: Letter from Van Wyck Brooks to Charles Prendergast (St. Augustine, Florida)
description: Letterhead: Van Wyck Brooks/ [crossed out:] 87 Kings Highway/ Westport, Connecticut. 2 double sided sheets. With envelope. Envelope letterhead: Van Wyck Brooks/ [crossed out] handwritten: Graham House,/ St. Augustine,/Florida
